bg@enchantedforest.display:name: Enchanted Forest
bg@enchantedforest.bg: linear-gradient(145deg, rgba(0,50,0,1), rgba(34,139,34,0.7) 20%, rgba(0,100,0,0.5) 40%, rgba(0,200,100,0.3) 60%, rgba(34,139,34,0.8) 80%, rgba(0,50,0,1)), radial-gradient(circle at 30% 30%, rgba(255,255,255,0.1), transparent 80%), radial-gradient(circle at 70% 70%, rgba(255,255,255,0.1), transparent 80%)

bg@twilight-mist.display:name: Twilight Mist
bg@twilight-mist.bg: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(60,60,90,1) 0%, rgba(90,110,140,0.8) 40%, rgba(120,140,160,0.6) 70%, rgba(60,60,90,1) 100%), radial-gradient(circle at 30% 40%, rgba(255,255,255,0.15), transparent 60%), radial-gradient(circle at 70% 70%, rgba(255,255,255,0.1), transparent 70%)

bg@duskhorizon.display:name: Dusk Horizon
bg@duskhorizon.bg: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(128,0,0,1) 0%, rgba(204,85,0,0.7) 20%, rgba(255,140,0,0.6) 45%, rgba(160,90,160,0.5) 65%, rgba(60,60,120,1) 100%), radial-gradient(circle at 30% 30%, rgba(255,255,255,0.1), transparent 60%), radial-gradient(circle at 70% 70%, rgba(255,255,255,0.05), transparent 70%)

bg@twilight-ember.display:name: Twilight Ember
bg@twilight-ember.bg: linear-gradient(120deg,hsla(350, 65%, 57%, 1),hsla(30,60%,60%, .75), hsla(208,69%,50%,.15), hsl(230,60%,40%)),radial-gradient(at top right,hsla(300,60%,70%,0.3),transparent),radial-gradient(at top left,hsla(330,100%,70%,.20),transparent),radial-gradient(at top right,hsla(190,100%,40%,.20),transparent),radial-gradient(at bottom left,hsla(323,54%,50%,.5),transparent),radial-gradient(at bottom left,hsla(144,54%,50%,.25),transparent)

bg@sakura-night.display:name: üå∏ Sakura Night
bg@sakura-night.bg: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(25,10,30,1) 0%, rgba(80,20,60,0.9) 25%, rgba(180,80,120,0.7) 50%, rgba(255,150,180,0.5) 70%, rgba(25,10,30,1) 100%), radial-gradient(circle at 20% 80%, rgba(255,183,197,0.3), transparent 50%), radial-gradient(circle at 80% 20%, rgba(255,105,180,0.2), transparent 40%)

bg@neon-tokyo.display:name: üèôÔ∏è Neon Tokyo
bg@neon-tokyo.bg: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(5,5,20,1) 0%, rgba(20,10,50,0.95) 20%, rgba(80,0,120,0.7) 50%, rgba(0,200,255,0.3) 75%, rgba(255,0,100,0.4) 100%), radial-gradient(circle at 30% 70%, rgba(0,255,255,0.15), transparent 50%), radial-gradient(circle at 70% 30%, rgba(255,0,128,0.15), transparent 50%)

bg@midnight-blue.display:name: üåô Midnight Blue
bg@midnight-blue.bg: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(5,5,30,1) 0%, rgba(10,15,60,0.95) 30%, rgba(15,25,80,0.85) 60%, rgba(20,40,100,0.7) 100%), radial-gradient(circle at 80% 20%, rgba(100,150,255,0.1), transparent 50%), radial-gradient(circle at 20% 80%, rgba(50,100,200,0.08), transparent 40%)

bg@ghibli-forest.display:name: üåø Ghibli Forest
bg@ghibli-forest.bg: linear-gradient(160deg, rgba(10,30,15,1) 0%, rgba(20,60,30,0.9) 25%, rgba(40,100,50,0.7) 50%, rgba(80,140,60,0.5) 70%, rgba(10,30,15,1) 100%), radial-gradient(circle at 30% 60%, rgba(120,200,80,0.15), transparent 50%), radial-gradient(circle at 70% 40%, rgba(200,230,100,0.08), transparent 40%)

bg@akatsuki.display:name: ‚òÅÔ∏è Akatsuki
bg@akatsuki.bg: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(30,0,0,1) 0%, rgba(120,10,10,0.85) 30%, rgba(180,20,20,0.6) 50%, rgba(50,0,0,0.9) 70%, rgba(10,0,0,1) 100%), radial-gradient(circle at 40% 50%, rgba(255,50,50,0.15), transparent 50%), radial-gradient(circle at 60% 60%, rgba(200,0,0,0.1), transparent 40%)

bg@kawaii-pink.display:name: üå∏ Kawaii Pink
bg@kawaii-pink.bg: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(18,8,24,1) 0%, rgba(80,10,60,0.9) 20%, rgba(255,105,180,0.4) 40%, rgba(200,100,255,0.3) 60%, rgba(255,182,193,0.2) 80%, rgba(18,8,24,1) 100%), radial-gradient(circle at 25% 75%, rgba(255,105,180,0.2), transparent 50%), radial-gradient(circle at 75% 25%, rgba(200,100,255,0.15), transparent 40%), radial-gradient(circle at 50% 50%, rgba(255,255,255,0.03), transparent 60%)

bg@neon-otaku.display:name: ‚ú® Neon Otaku
